translations.intro2: Timeless Stories of El Salvador V2: Epiphany
translations.intro3: The 2nd volume of Timeless Stories of El Salvador. A new book full of epic adventures that teleports you to the past of El Salvador. Enjoy 31 new fully illustrated folkloric legends and fairytales.
translations.author1: is a Spanish-Salvadoran innovator and traveler on a mission to build a better world through technology ‚Äî and to reimagine the Salvadoran perspective through the lens of folklore.
translations.author2: His career began in IT, but as an immigrant living in Poland, Spain and Luxembourg, he encountered widespread biases against his homeland, El Salvador. These misconceptions were often rooted in a lack of accessible information in languages like English, Polish, Czech, German, etc. This gap inspired him to create the first series of Salvadoran folklore books in English.
translations.author3: Each book features 31 legendary tales passed down orally for generations ‚Äî from stories of Sir Francis Drake hiding treasure on Meanguera Island, to mischievous twins transformed into the mythical Cadejos by a wise shaman.
translations.author4: As a person, Federico believes that everyone has the power to become their own hero. He often says: ‚ÄúThe only person who can reshape your destiny is the one you see in the mirror.‚Äù Dare to be your own hero ‚Äî starting today.
